review: Well, hackers got to the point where they use my name to kill all others on the server. So people think its me who is hacking. Besides that, the hacker succeeded in putting me in a death-loop, where i endlessly die. On top of that, he succesfully crashed my game, probably with an invalid texture input. Eventhough i have lots of fun playing , this is an issue that needs to be solved.
Hackers, thats all i have to say. Nothing is being done to stop the hackers. They run around in the online play and kill everything.

Garbage always-online "periodic entitlement verification" DRM treating actual paying customers like thieves. Cheaters rampant online. Lobbies constantly implode. They're also pulling some shady stuff during the summer sale to avoid actually lowering the price.
